Detailed Description

Routines for controlling the onboard Analog-Digital converter. 

 #include <adc.h>

This Routines are for initializing the ADC and selecting the analog input channel of the multiplexer. After a channel has be activated, a single conversion may be performed by calling read_adc().

Note:
Based on Atmel Datasheet for Atmega128, Nov. 2006
Author:
Rainer Ostendorf

unsigned int read_adc (  ) 

start an ADConversion, busy-wait for the result and return it a conversion will last approx. 12us (calculated, not measured, TODO)

Returns:
the conversion result
